text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe You're a disgrace Nancy. What exactly was Trump SUPPOSED to do to "prepare" for coronavirus? You called his Chinese travel suspension "xenophobic". What would YOU have done differently? https://t.co/TJLQcYx8No
